item.title: About
item.description: This Task was able to be finished after four Iterations, on the first iteration I followed this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZFL09qhKi5I&t=484s, before making my website, which helped helped me absorb a large amount of information to make my website. but on my own personal site, I was unable to create tags like this “about” tag to write my process on, or push my work to github. on the second version I used this video https://www.
